column4: [   22.311864] iwlagn 0000:03:00.0: request for firmware file 'iwlwifi-5000-2.ucode' failed.
[   22.313663] iwlagn 0000:03:00.0: request for firmware file 'iwlwifi-5000-1.ucode' failed.
that card needs firmware (as the error says), which you gett with: "sudo apt-get install linux-firmware"
sudo apt-get install linux-firmware                           what happens when installing?
get in manually from http://mirrors.us.kernel.org/ubuntu//pool/main/l/linux-firmware/linux-firmware_1.38_all.deb and use dpkg to install
LANG=C apt-cache policy linux-firmware  | grep -i insta
however, it misses the firmware you need. remove it, install the one from repos
